description:
Several years after an incident that plunged the world into chaos, the world is once again at peace. Shadowverse has become even more popular, and the Shadowverse Battle Academy, or Shadoba Academy, had been established to train people into professional players.
http://anidb.net/ch121615 [Tenryuu Light], an eighth-grader, is by chance asked by Zelga Wolfram, the founder of Shadoba Academy, to transfer to his academy. Light, a complete Shadowverse novice, decides to join a "Shadoba Club" due to his best friend that wanted him to, http://anidb.net/ch121616 [Makabe Subaru]. Shadoba Clubs are clubs composed of students who are serious about Shadowverse, and there are seven of them. Light, by chance, decides to join one of them, "Seventh Flame". However, Seventh Flame has only one member and is in danger of being discontinued! In order to keep the club alive, Light, along with http://anidb.net/ch121617 [Mitsutagawa Itsuki], the head of Seventh Flame, and Makabe Subaru, decide to look for new members. But there`s a suspicious person hiding in the shadows: Hazeura Haruma, the head of the Shadoba club "First Reaper"...
Source: Shadowverse Wiki

REGULAR.description:
Light Tenryu is a new kid who`s just come to the Shadowverse Battle College after a strange man told him he could "find his destiny" here. What fantastic adventures await him?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: My Shadowverse Begins Here!
Ore no Shadowver wa Koko kara Hajimaru!
俺のシャドバはここから始まる!

REGULAR.description:
The Seventh Flame Shadowverse club has to get more members if they want to survive. But everyone who wants to play Shadowverse has already joined a club, so where can they find new members? Light has a brilliant plan...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kore ga Ore no Meian Da
This Is My Brilliant Plan!
これが俺の名案だ

REGULAR.description:
Light wants Shinobu to join Seventh Flame, but she`ll only listen to him if he can beat her first. The only problem is... he has no idea how to play Shadowverse!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle Shita kara Wakarunda
I Can Tell Because We Battled!
バトルしたから分かるんだ

REGULAR.description:
Light faces off against Gentleman, a strategic genius who uses the avatar of a magician`s rabbit. Can he prevail against his foe`s gigantic brain?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Lady & Gentleman
Lady & Gentleman!
レディー&ジェントルマン!

REGULAR.description:
Light`s battle with Gentleman reaches its peak as he gets ready to summon his ultimate card. But what if his best card isn`t his best move?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Do Me a Favor
Hitotsu Tanomi o Kiite Kure
一つ頼みを聞いてくれ

REGULAR.description:
The gang meets Ren, a young girl with Fifth Sword. She likes running and working out, but feels left out when she`s with the other girls in her club. Is there a better place for her to belong?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Courage Will Always Give You Strength!
Yuuki wa Kanarazu Chikara o Kureru!
勇気は必ず力をくれる!

REGULAR.description:
Itsuki battles the head of Fifth Sword to allow Ren to join the team. Can the timid, shy Itsuki stand up to the most athletic Shadowverse player of them all?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Sore ga Boku no Tsuyosa Desu!
That`s My Strength!
それが僕の強さです!

REGULAR.description:
Subaru challenges Hahajima, the Club President of Fourth Wind. Hahajima gives it her all for the sake of her club members, but Subaru seems like he`s not having fun...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Expectations Are a Curse
Kitai Nante Noroi Da yo
期待なんて呪いだよ

REGULAR.description:
Subaru and Fuwari`s battle reaches its last half. Can Subaru win? And does he even want to?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Omae no Battle o Misete Kure!
Show Me Your Battle!
お前のバトルを見せてくれ!

REGULAR.description:
Tsubasa is cool, pretty, and liked by everyone. She spends her days doing karaoke and hanging out with her friends. Sure, her team was shut down by Haruma Hazeura. But what`s the point of even trying, anyway?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Maji ni Natte mo Imi Naishi ne
There`s No Point in Getting Serious
マジになっても意味ないしね

REGULAR.description:
Light begins his battle with Tsubasa, the head of Third Feather. She`s convinced that there`s no hope left in Shadowverse. Can he prove her wrong?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Anta ni Rikai Saretakunai...
I Don`t Want Your Understanding...
アンタに理解されたくない...

REGULAR.description:
Light`s battle with Tsubasa reaches its conclusion. Can Seventh Flame get the last team member they need to survive?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Dakara Shadowver wa, Omoshiroi!
That`s What Makes Shadowverse Fun!
だからシャドバは, 面白い!

REGULAR.description:
Now that Seventh Flame has a full crew, Light decides to challenge Haruma. But Light is acting very strange...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Only the Strong Survive in Shadowverse!
Shadowver wa Jakunikukyoushoku Da!
シャドバは弱肉強食だっ!

REGULAR.description:
As Light faces Hazeura, he realizes quickly that he`s gotten more than he bargained for. Will his luck hold out against the President of First Reaper?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Omae ni Nai no wa Hitsuzen Da!
What You Lack Is Inevitability!
お前にないのは必然だ!

REGULAR.description:
Following his defeat to Hazeura, Light decides to buckle down and learn more about Shadowverse. His first opponent is none other than the legendary idol and Shadowverse player Alice Kurobane!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle in a Way That`s True to Yourself!
Jibun Rashiku Battle Shiyo
自分らしくバトルしよ♪

REGULAR.description:
Subaru saves Mimori from an overly-aggressive street proselytizer. As they get to know each other, they decide to play a game of Shadowverse.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honki no Shadowver o Misete Ageru ne!
I`ll Show You Real Shadowverse!
本気のシャドバを見せてあげるね!

REGULAR.description:
Subaru continues his battle with Mimori. A miserable childhood left him cold to Shadowverse. Can she help him find the fire inside him once more?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want Shadowverse to Excite Me!
Shadover de Atsuku Naritai Desu
シャドバで熱くなりたいです

REGULAR.description:
Itsuki challenges Ryoga, a powerful Bloodcraft player who hangs out by the riverside, and claims that his "rhythm is the heartbeat of a devil."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My Rhythm Is the Heartbeat of a Devil!
Ore no Rhythm wa Akuma no Shin`on
俺のリズムは悪魔の心音

REGULAR.description:
Itsuki`s battle continues against the demon of sound. Can he rise above the noise and win the day?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Have My Own Ace in the Hole!
Kirifuda Dattara Ore mo Aru!
切り札だったら俺もある!

REGULAR.description:
Ren wants to be friends with Tsubasa, but Tsubasa has other things on her mind. That`s about to change though, when Ren challenges her to a game of Shadowverse!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dakara Suggoku Tanoshii Desu!
That`s What Makes It So Fun!
だからすっごく楽しいです!

REGULAR.description:
Ren challenges Tsubasa, the girl she admires so much. Can she win her respect, and her friendship?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If You Can`t Surpass Me, There`s No Point
Koete Misenakya Hanashi ni Naranai
超えて見せなきゃ話にならない

REGULAR.description:
Ren and Tsubasa are hot on the trail of Gentleman, the most mysterious member of Seventh Flame. But when they find him, he`s not at all what they expect!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ve Finally Found You!
Tsui ni Anta o Mitsketa yo!
ついにアンタを見つけたよ!

REGULAR.description:
Tsubasa battles Gentleman, who`s even tougher in real life than she is as a digital avatar!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kimi ja King wa Koerarenai!
You Can`t Surpass the King!
君じゃキングは越えられない!

REGULAR.description:
In search of a way to master Shadowverse before his battle with Haruma, Light challenges his own teacher. But he`s shocked when he finds out what her rank is!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kimitte Nibui ne
You`re Dense, Aren`t You?
君って鈍いね

REGULAR.description:
As he readies himself for a showdown with Haruma, Light must first defeat his own teacher to master the secrets of Shadowcraft.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kore ga Omae no Shin no Sugata ka!
So This Is Your True Form?
これがお前の真の姿か!

REGULAR.description:
The Shadowverse Club Tournament begins as Gentleman challenges Shinobu in a duel to prove who`s the real master of Runecraft at Shadowverse Battle College.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shadowver Bu Taikousen o Kaishi Suru......!
The Shadowverse Club Tournament Begins!
シャドバ部対抗戦を開始する......!

REGULAR.description:
Gentleman finishes his duel with Miki, the girl he once thought he had under his thumb. Does she really hate him for the way he bossed her around?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Not Who I Used to Be!
Mukashi no Mama ja Nainda yo!
昔のままじゃないんだよっ!

REGULAR.description:
Tsubasa challenges her old club president, Seira, in a battle to see who`s the true leader of Third Feather.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Atashi mo Minna no Senpai Desu kara!
I`m Everybody`s Senpai, Too!
私もみんなの先輩ですからっ!

REGULAR.description:
Ren challenges her old club president as Seventh Flame faces Fifth Sword!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Show You the Person I Want to Be!
Watashi no Akogare Butsukemasu!
私の憧れぶつけますっ!

REGULAR.description:
It`s Subaru`s turn to take the stage in the battle against Fourth Wind at the Shadowverse Club Tournament!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It Doesn`t Feel Bad
Warukunai Kibun Daze
悪くない気分だぜ

REGULAR.description:
Itsuki fights Ryoga Jasei in a duel to see if Seventh Flame can advance to the final round of the Shadowverse Club Tournament.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Show You the Strength of a Flower That Blooms in the Fields!
No ni Saku Hana no Tsuyosa o Miseru!
野に咲く花の強さを見せる!

REGULAR.description:
Light duels Haruma in the final battle of the Shadowverse club tournament. Can he win this time after failing before?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Omae mo Zetsubou Surunda yo!
You`re Going to Despair, Too!
お前も絶望するんだよ!

REGULAR.description:
The showdown with Haruma draws to a close as the Shadowverse Club Tournament reaches its end. Can Light truly come to understand his foe?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ima no Ore Nara, Omae ni Todoku!
Now I`m Strong Enough to Reach You!
今の俺なら, お前に届く!

REGULAR.description:
It`s a resort, everybody! With victory in hand, the members of Seventh Flame get ready for a relaxing day at a private island.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s a Resort, Everybody!
Minasan! Resort Desu yo!
みなさん! リゾートですよ!

REGULAR.description:
There`s more fun in the sun as Seventh Flame relaxes on Genesis Island!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Make Memories Together!
Tomo ni Omoide o Kasane you
共に思い出を重ねよう

REGULAR.description:
Light challenges Mikado, who plays a Neutral deck. Neutral cards are supposed to be the weakest type, but Mikado`s might be stronger than it appears...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boku ni Totte Subete wa Asobi
To Me, It`s All a Game
僕にとって全ては遊び

REGULAR.description:
The duel with Mikado continues as he unleashes a flurry of powerful Fallen Angels, and an unstoppable dragon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Give You Fulfillment!
Ore ga Omae o Mitashite Yarou!
俺がお前を満たしてやろう!

REGULAR.description:
A shocking turn of events takes place as a new Shadowverse tournament begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Come Unto Us!
Warera ga Moto made Kuru ga Ii!
我らが元まで来るが良い!

REGULAR.description:
Light battles the elder of the two Joubert sisters and her tricky combo deck.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kore Koso ga Justine Shimai no Kirifuda!
This Is the True Power of the Joubert Sisters!
これこそがジュスティーヌ姉妹の切り札!

REGULAR.description:
Light challenges his first pro player, a tricky Earth Rite Runecraft user!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nan no Tame ni Tsuyoku Naru?
Why Do You Get Stronger?
何のために強くなる?

REGULAR.description:
Light challenges Mikado once more, this time with more powerful cards. Can he defeat the school`s strongest player?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kore ga Oretachi no Arata na Chikara Da!
This Is Our New Power!
これが俺達の新たな力だ!

REGULAR.description:
Subaru fights his brother in a surprise bonus match!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Take This One Step with All My Might!
Kono Ippo o Zenryoku de Fumishimeru!
この一歩を全力で踏みしめるっ!

REGULAR.description:
Shion battles a powerful Grand Master who wants to teach her a lesson about being alone. But is that really what she needs to hear?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitori de Shika Mirarenu Keshiki mo Aru
Some Sights Can Only Be Seen Alone!
一人でしか見られぬ景色もある

REGULAR.description:
Wolfram Zerga challenges dark horse Ryoga Jasei in an attempt to make him enter the World Ranking.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Light Up Your Future
Watashi ga Kimi no Mirai o Terasou
私が君の未来を照らそう

REGULAR.description:
Itsuki challenges the legendary player Luca Yonazuki, one of the Seven Shadows.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ve Got High Hopes for You
Kimi ni wa Kitai Shite Iru yo
君には期待しているよ

REGULAR.description:
Ren meets a fellow fan of the Battle Fencer TV show who has very different ideas about who the best character is.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hero Nante Gaki no Asobi Da!
Heroes Are for Little Kids!
ヒーローなんてガキの遊びだ!

REGULAR.description:
Ren continues her battle with Hina, as each of them seeks to prove whether heroes or villains are stronger.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Soredemo Watashi o Tsuranukimasu!
Still, I`ll Stay True to Myself!
それでも私を貫きます!

REGULAR.description:
Tsubasa talks about her dreams of going pro as she battles the grand master Andrea.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sono Mabushisa mo Yagate wa Kieru
That Dazzling Light Will Someday Fade
その眩しさもやがては消える

REGULAR.description:
Light challenges Mikado for the final time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ore ni Totte, Kimi wa
To Me, You Are...
俺にとって, 君は

REGULAR.description:
Light reaches the climactic showdown in his battle with Mikado.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ve Finally Made It This Far!
Ore wa Youyaku, Koko made Kitazo!
俺はようやく, ここまで来たぞ!

SPECIAL.description:
In this special episode, Seventh Flame looks back on all the fun they`ve had playing Shadowverse!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Special Episode
Tokubetsu Hen
特別編

SPECIAL.description:
Shadowverse Flame is back! But before we see what happened to Light and the Gang, let`s take a look back at the World Ranking and Club Tournament.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Special Episode 2
Tokubetsu Hen 2
特別編2
Housou Chokuzen Special
Pre-Broadcast Special
放送直前スペシャル
Shadowverse Flame
Shadowverse Flame
シャドウバースFLAME
shadoba s2
シャドウバース フレイム
